text:
RITU KUMAR: In India, I think
the business role is still

we are living in a highly
impoverished country.

And part of the business
role does definitely

have to take your corporate
social responsibility
into account.

In my case, I feel that
my field has given me

so much enrichment,
as well as so many

opportunities that it is part
of the company's responsibility

to sustain a bit of
that, definitely.
So part of the role would be--
and it's need-based.

There is need in India
still for businesses

like us to be able
to facilitate,

design in areas,
which need design,
giving employment in areas.
More than employment.

I mean, also reviving
some more textiles that
are being lost to the world.

So I would definitely say our
business is very well placed
to take part of that role.
And we should do it.
